attributes.action: Reject Proposals to Permit Abortion Providers to Advertise their Services on Television or Radio
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Broadcasting Committee of Advertising Practice has put forward proposals to allow abortion providers to advertise on television and radio.
These proposal should be rejected as they disregard:
the offensive nature of such advertisments;
widespread public concern about the practice of abortion; and
legal restriction on advertising prescription drugs and medical services.
